long_description: The medium-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes. It easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into the Kinetic trainer cone cups. Medium thread pitch is compatible with the Diamondback Mission series, Sortie 29er series, Scapegoat and Slopestyle. Also compatible with Pivot, Yeti, Bianchi (2014), Rocky Mountain, BH, Redline, and Giant 27.5 models. Please note that Santa Cruz bikes with a closed dropout on the drive side (2013/14) will not currently work with the Traxle.
short_description: The medium-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes. It easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into the Kinetic trainer cone cups.
